page.title: 18Sevenoaks Hospital
page.content: Sevenoaks Hospital is situated in the area of Sevenoaks known as the Bat and Ball at the bottom of St. John's Hill. There are three buildings on the site which house a Maternity Ward, an Old Peoples Ward, Outpatients and Family Planning Clinic, Pathology and Pharmacy Laboratories, twenty-four hour Casualty facilities and nursing wards for men and women. Minor surgery is carried out in the hospital theatre, any major operations are taken to either Farnborough, Kent and Sussex, Orpington or Pembury Hospitals where there are facilities to cater for major operations. The Director of Nursing Services is Mrs. Marshall. There are also two Nursing Officers which assist in the running of the hospital.
